laboratory_examinations.findings: Decreased 99mTc-HMPAO activity in the left parieto-occipital cortex during the aura phase consistent with transient neurologic symptoms.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: A second SPECT performed 4 days later showed normal regional cerebral blood flow when no neurological symptoms were observed.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Laboratory analysis (hematological, biochemical, and cerebrospinal fluid)
